name: ENTITY-Class Comp/Con
effect:
The weapon this mod is applied to gains Overkill. In addition, at the beginning of each scene, choose one Invade option available to you. 1/round, on a hit with the weapon this mod is applied to, you may apply the chosen Invade to the target as a reaction.

ENTITY isnâ€™t a full NHP, so cannot enter cascade.
description: A fragment of something, silent but watching. It has shaped itself into a weapon for you to wield.
